item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Magic/tragic email links: don't make them the only option (92 points | 68 comments)
2. Mistakes engineers make in large established codebases (50 points | 8 comments)
3. Show HN: Tramway SDK – The Unholy Union Between Half-Life and Morrowind Engines (366 points | 123 comments)
4. The Egg, an at Home Nuclear Reactor (44 points | 25 comments)

6. Physicists Magnetize a Material with Light (82 points | 19 comments)

8. A video tour of the Standard Model (2021) (34 points | discuss)
9. Ending our third party fact-checking program and moving to Community Notes model (386 points | 551 comments)
10. Collusion Through Common Leadership – Tech No-Poach Lists [pdf] (98 points | 45 comments)
11. Laid Off in My Career, and Twice in One Year (27 points | 3 comments)

13. OmniAI (YC W24) Hiring Engineers to Build Open Source Document Extraction ( | hide)
14. Building Ultra Long Range Toslink (132 points | 61 comments)

19. Nvidia announces next-gen RTX 5090 and RTX 5080 GPUs (389 points | 496 comments)
20. PostgreSQL Support for Certificate Transparency Logs Now Available (29 points | 8 comments)
21. Zig's comptime is bonkers good (386 points | 200 comments)
22. Type 2 Diabetes and cardiovascular disease attributable to sugar beverages (103 points | 93 comments)
23. Choosing an op-amp for your project (113 points | 62 comments)
24. USB On-The-Go (145 points | 64 comments)
25. Transcendental Syntax (62 points | 25 comments)
26. Ask HN: Have you ever seen a pathfinding algorithm of this type? (31 points | 30 comments)
27. Hackers Claim Breach of Location Data Giant, Threaten to Leak Data (14 points | 6 comments)
28. Microsoft disguises Bing as Google to fool inattentive searchers (177 points | 140 comments)
29. Stimulation Clicker (2740 points | 532 comments)
30. A feature-rich Hacker News client (64 points | 35 comments)
